title: My Favorite Algorithm: Linear Time Median Finding (2018)
dot:
digraph MedianFinding{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box];A[label="Finding the Median"];B1[label="O(n log n)"];B2[label="Average O(n)"];B3[label="Deterministic O(n)"]; C1[label="Sort the list
and pick median"];C2[label="Quickselect Algorithm"];C3[label="Median-of-Medians Algorithm"]; D1[label="Time Complexity: O(n log n)
(Using sorting)"];D2[label="1. Choose a pivot
2. Partition list
3. Recurse on one partition"];D3[label="1. Split list into groups of 5
2. Find median of each group
3. Use median of medians as pivot"]; E1[label="Simple Implementation"];E2[label="Average Case: O(n)
(But can be O(n^2) in worst case)"];E3[label="Guaranteed O(n)"]; A->B1;A->B2;A->B3;B1->C1;B2->C2;B3->C3;C1->D1;C2->D2;C3->D3;D1->E1;D2->E2;D3->E3;}
